ResearchTabDef.label: Dead Man Switch
ResearchTabDef.generalDescription: In the name of improving human civilization, Nara Industries spread technologies to every planet they anchored, forcing native residents to complete the selection process of the Great Filter amidst turbulent technological progress in a short period.\n\nSome people say that the colonial fleets are several groups of industrial complexes controlled by AIs whom capable of interstellar traveling between galaxies.

ResearchProjectDef.label: material engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: "A perfect material can be calculate through a set of scientific methods" this is one of the breakthough mankind are ever achived.

ResearchProjectDef.label: artificial fiber
ResearchProjectDef.description: unlock the production of artificial fabrics,these man-made fabric has their pros and cons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: drone basis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use simple control logic and signal transceivers to unlock the construction of simple mechanical units.

ResearchProjectDef.label: automatroid basis
ResearchProjectDef.description: because they are not just a weapon but weapon that is capable to eliminate target by themselves, these robots was such a topic and own a name to them "automatroid" \n\n Such a morally outrageous weapon should never acceptable at normal, but since it is widely used by nations during ww3 so it has become a mundane part of the battlefield..

ResearchProjectDef.label: mecha gear
ResearchProjectDef.description: "mecha gear"is a tern that cover those near future machining design pattern, was originally satirize exaggerated designs that do not correspond to reality. \n\n However, advanced materials that have been invented and improved over millennia have become the basis for bringing these designs to life.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Legion
ResearchProjectDef.description: Series of automatroid designed for large-scale warfare. Most of them have only simple weapon operating systems, but their clear division of labor and cheap production costs make them the most impressive combat weapons in terms of service scale.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dead Man's Switch
ResearchProjectDef.description:
The Dead Man's Switch is a mechanical safety mechanism intended to self-terminate device active when the operator becomes incapacitated. 

 Before human seek into space, they discovered this machanism will eventually made artificial intelligence understand...the meaning of death...
 this discover lead humanity to new era of history....

 an era of those fifth level ai.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Some of the advanced automatroid required specific part which is not manufactured in gravity environment.\n\n But the colonial fleet told us that we can feel free to attract and destroy their out of command automatroids to obtain those parts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: artificial muscle
ResearchProjectDef.description: artifuscle is a type of prosthetic material made by genetically engineered sauromorph muscle bundles, and soon... Arms dealers realized the future of mechanical-biological hybrid weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: neural prosthetic
ResearchProjectDef.description: Neural prosthetic are designed for disabled soldiers. It is durable and the need for adaptation training is almost negligible. However, due to the consideration of durability and mass production, its work efficiency is not as good as the original one.

ResearchProjectDef.label: pioneer equipment
ResearchProjectDef.description: uniform and equipment designed for human, mainly for colonization purpose include for survival specialist, dropcraft crew and Biotoxicity Handling Squad.

ResearchProjectDef.label: cluster transceiver
ResearchProjectDef.description: Cluster transceivers are a way humans have developed to control robots in war, and of course it's not very comfortable for robots that generate self-awareness through DMS.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Defense equipment
ResearchProjectDef.description: equipment designed for human and automatroid, mainly for colony Defense and riot purpose.

ResearchProjectDef.label: military equipment
ResearchProjectDef.description: equipment designed for automatroid which too heavy to operated by humankind, mainly for military purpose.

ResearchProjectDef.label: heavy weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: heavy equipment designed for automatroid which even too heavy to be operated by some small automatroid, mainly for military purpose.

ResearchProjectDef.label: battle friends
ResearchProjectDef.description: Due to the ages, we have been unable to know the correct name supposed to be "battle frames" or "battle friends", but anyway these are type of automatic exoskeleton that can be a frame of equipment or friend in combat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hybird Engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: The establishment of biological-mechanical hybrid technology was during WW3, where mercenary who was soldiers in countries whrere involved in the war established an armed state with military personnel,using drone and hybrid prosthetic helping the retired wounded return to battle. \n\n And soon, countries military realized the influence of bio-mechanical hybrids on modern warfare and rushed to armed in their armies.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Biosynthetic
ResearchProjectDef.description: with the advance of robotic and bionic engineering, making bionic with biological-mechanical hybrid technology has became possible.

ResearchProjectDef.label: organ surgery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Humanity gave up a lot in that long war... even if it can be made up later, there is something lost forever.

ResearchProjectDef.label: in short hypothesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: after the discover of The Dead man's switch, yánzhī Jiǎn an AI algorithm engineer proposed a hypothetical solution to the halting problem...\n\n And around this conjecture, we seem to be getting closer to the so-called omnipotent machinery.

ResearchProjectDef.label: heavy automatroid
ResearchProjectDef.description: These heavy machines were prepared for a full-scale war among mankind, but forturnatelly these scale of war doesn't often.

ResearchProjectDef.label: humanoid engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: during war, automatroid with human shapes are proven to be a good design where the ergonomics and psychological suggestion are work on them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Peacekeepers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Series of automatroid designed for urban warfare, characterized by its disk-shaped sensor head and heavy armor. Often used in security warfare, riot control and peacekeeping operation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Next-Gen weaponry(WIP)
ResearchProjectDef.description: the weapon development around mechanical-biological hybrid continued until the Fourth World War, and it reach to the height a man can thought before ...synthetic humanoid.
